alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:23AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Grand County through NOON MDT... At 1122 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles southeast of Green River, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Grand County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 184 and 206. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 141 and 156. Utah 128 between mile markers 43 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
